notes.title: Group Project Kickoff
notes.body: We brainstormed ideas for our final project and agreed on a Notes App.

notes.title: Book Summary: Atomic Habits
notes.body:
Key Insight: Small habits compound over time.
“You do not rise to the level of your goals, you fall to the level of your systems.”

notes.title: Coding Practice Log
notes.body:
Solved 3 LeetCode problems:
1. Two Sum
2. Valid Parentheses
3. Merge Intervals

notes.title: Meeting with Mentor
notes.body: Great advice on balancing coding with soft skills. Need to start reading more leadership books.

notes.title: App Design Inspiration
notes.body: Loved the layout on Dribble. Minimalist and clean UI with soft shadows.
